ygData.messageBody:
ack.. sorry.. hehe.. replied to the wrong message..

My reply to this one was supposed to be:

What critters did you get all those pages off of? I have gotten a word off
of scarecrows in West Karana, but have yet to find any other research items
anywhere.


> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
> You will find woven armor on Froglocks in the Ogre areas of Antonica. I
> don't think there is anywhere on Faydwer to get it.
>
>
> > From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
> >
> > I have a bunch that dont match on the Innoruuk Server. Contact me in the
> > game if interested for trades.
> > Skara the Enchantress
